Body:
self.lv_act = Actions()
self.lv_act.add(name='ExpandLV', pre_conditions={'lv_need_expansion': True,
    'vg_need_expansion': False}, effects={'lv_need_expansion': False},
    shell='echo expand_lv', cost=1.0)
self.lv_act.add(name='ExpandVG', pre_conditions={'vg_need_expansion': True,
    'pv_need_expansion': False}, effects={'vg_need_expansion': False},
    shell='echo expand_vg')
self.lv_act.add(name='ExpandPV', pre_conditions={'pv_need_expansion': True},
    effects={'pv_need_expansion': False}, shell='echo purge_old_files',
    cost=1.5)
